item.title: A Tour of Template method pattern with Golang
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Problem Just imagine we need to implement a registration feature for our applications (web, mobile). A typical registration will have some basic steps such as fill in the form, verify account, redirect to login page, etc.
